## Datasource.dropView() method

Removes the specified dataview from the datasource.

**Signature:**

```typescript
dropView?(view: Dataview): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  view | [Dataview](./foundation-comms.dataview.md) | The dataview to remove. |

**Returns:**

void
